quieten.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to become calmer and less noisy or active, or to make someone or something do this
quieten.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Javed Miandad appealed for calm, but he failed to quieten the protesters.
Quiet down and get ready for bed!
Things tend to quieten down after Christmas.
quieten.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to reduce a feeling such as fear or worry
quieten.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: I managed to quieten her fears.
